thread.title: Denmark Open: PV Sindhu reaches quarters, remains India's lone flag bearer in the tourney
thread.title_full: Denmark Open: PV Sindhu reaches quarters, remains India's lone flag bearer in the tourney - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Denmark Open: PV Sindhu reaches quarters, remains India's lone flag bearer in the tourney
text: Two-time bronze medallist at World Championship, P V Sindhu emerged as the only surviving Indian at the Denmark Open after she secured a straight-game win over Chinese Taipei's Tai Tzu Ying to reach the quarterfinals of the USD 650,000 Super Series Premier event Â»
